data.title: Speaking at META conf
data.text:
Location: peterborough
Date: 10/05/2018

I converted my most successful medium article “I did mob programming every day for 5 months, here’s what I learnt” in to a talk at the BGL Groups all-company conference META.

data.title: Coach at Codebar London
data.text:
Location: London
Date: 27/03/2018

CodeBar is a event aimed at helping beginner programmers develop the skills they need to suceed. During the event I acted as a coach teaching React. you can find out more information on codebar here: https://codebar.io/
